transArray.content:
The only advantage is that the lobby of the hotel is very large and it is convenient to have breakfast.
It’s okay to meet and chat with a friend, and I can’t find any faults in the attitude, just one point: the two sessions of booking and picking up the room emphasized not to use the next room, but the first room given to all three room types is definitely intentional. With a two-year-old baby, crying in the middle of the night, furious. Bad review!
